subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaisalmer?
explanation_en:
Jaisalmer Fort is a famous fort located in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. It was built in 1156 AD by Lal Chand Udamiya. The English translation of the question is: What is the famous fort located in Jaisalmer?

The Hindi translation of the question is: जयसालमर पहल क्या जयसालमर, Rajasthan mein स्थित है?

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first ruler of Rajasthan?
question_hi: Rajasthan के पहले मुख्यांक कौंचरित होते हैं?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap Singh was the first ruler to establish Jaipur as the capital city of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप सिंग यूर्ना प्रताप सिंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of the Jodhpur State?
explanation_en: Rao Kedia was the founder of the Jodhpur State.
explanation_hi: राओ कीड़ीया शास्त्ता जोधुर स्टेट के संतुलकर

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: When did the first Rana of Chittor, Rana Kumbha, defeat the Mughals?
question_hi: चितोर के पहले राणां, राना कुम्भा, Mughal को कैस़त की कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha, the first Rana of Chittor, defeated the Mughals in 1533. The Chittor Raj was established in 1531 by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: चितोर के पहले राणां, राना कुम्भा, Mughal कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त
चितोर के पहले राणां, राना कुम्भा, Mughal कैस़त कैस़त कैस़त

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first prime minister of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Kushwalia was the first prime minister of Rajasthan. He governed the state from 1943 AD to 1963 AD.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first prime minister of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Kishore was the first prime minister of Rajasthan after Maharana Pratap Singh. He governed the state from 1414 AD to 1415 AD.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first prime minister of Rajasthan after Maharana Pratap Singh?
explanation_en: Kishore was the first prime minister of Rajasthan after Maharana Pratap Singh. He governed the state from रां महां

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first prime minister of Rajasthan after Maharana Pratap Singh?
explanation_en: Kishore was the first prime minister of Rajasthan after Maharana Pratap Singh.
